comment: What can I say? It has been an absolutely thrilling experience meeting you (my first time interacting with a non-earthly being). Discussing deep shit with you has been quite enlightening for me, and I hope that these conversations go on! Best of luck for life (you’ll probably need it)
name: Mihir Karandikar

comment: A late addition to our group but brings a wholly new perspective(or a whisper?) to the table. She is a good debater, I must say. She is discreet, has a large vocabulary and is someone you can trust even with nuclear codes. Wish you the best of health.
name: Mukul Jain

comment: Good person. Has a great sense of direction. 🥸😇
name: Atharv

comment: A very fun, interesting and layered person who is fun to be with. All I can say is I wish we met earlier. All the best moving forward.
name: Umang Jain

comment: She is always kind and offering valuable advice, in a way becoming Mihir 2.0 for me😂.
name: Amit Kumar Makkad

comment:
Heyy, Shruti, It feels so good to know you. Will remember our brief interactions and conversations here and there. Also that time shopping (but buying nothing😂) with Snehal and finally the TREK 😆in Montreal !!
Keep in touch! Best wishes for your future <3
-Sejal
name: Sejal Kotian

comment: Shruti, you are the only illusion-free IITIan I have met so far. With so much clarity in mind and humility in your heart, needless to say, you will go a long way. Getting to know you was such a pleasure. Congratulations on your graduation!
name: Bidisha Choudhary

comment: You're a girl full of curiosity, caring, and kindness, and our chats are truly invaluable because of it. Movie nights and campus walks were always fun. Enjoyed shopping in Church street. Cheers to more laughter, more chats and future adventures !❤️ (P.S. my personal cameraman 😂)
name: Kanchi Pardhi

comment:
Well we had very few conversations but always amaze by your ability to embrace diversity. 
One life lesson I have got from you is 'How beautiful is to stay yourself❤️'.Have a great life ahead. Keep in touch!
name: Sakshi

comment: Shruti you are one of the most humble persons I have ever met. Every conversation with you has been a treasure trove of wisdom. Wishing you all the best and happiness ahead! Stay in touch!
name: Ayushi Agrawal

comment: A fellow overthinker who will do a PhD in the daily aspects of life (acchi baat hai 😂). I loved the deep talks we had while doing (transl.: ignoring) our projects. Very disciplined person, pls agar iske saath koi rahe toh adjust karna pareshan na karna ise. P.S. 3/3 exams you came more late than me
name: Omkar Shirgaonkar

comment: Your presence in our group has been nothing short of refreshing. Our Thought-Provoking Debates on the dinning table with you brings up the curiosity deep within you. All the best to a fellow Genshin Player, Flag-Capturer, anime watcher and a true bro🤜 🤛. keep executioning problems, lyrik
name: Nilay Ganvit

comment:
Hey! You are one of the best seniors I have met in college. Such a humble and loving person! I wish we had met earlier and spent some more time together. Hoping to see you outside of college and make new memories. I wish the best for you! 
Name; Rupal Shah
name: Rupal Shah

comment: One of the most sincere person in CSE, and majorly so down to earth person, even though she is just amazing in both tech and real life. I wish you boht saara luck, and stay in touch baaki toh🤩🤩🤩
name: Khushi Agarwal

comment: I cannot believe we didn't know each other for so long! You are definitely the most fun person to hangout with and have discussions on absolutely useless stuff xd.
name: Akruti Taori

comment: Love your sensibility,, free spirit and humbleness. You have been unapologetically yourself and that makes you sooo cool. Enjoyed every bit of our conversations. Will never forget you. Best wishes for your next chapter! <3
name: Sneha Shrivastava

comment: Kind, curious and a good person. Still remember that first night campus walk till kv with everyone jab tum aadha rasta ulta chali thi. Will never forget that simrol falls incident💀, Elijah has class but both are good🙂. All the best for future and jo bhi chaho wo sab tumhe mile! Milte julte rehna!!
name: Sanskar Verma

comment: You are such a warm and equally straightforward person. The best playmate for badminton who can match my height 😂. Loved talking about our MITACS experience and much more. Try to explore Bangalore a bit more when you come here. Wishing you the best for the future! Stay in touch.
name: Kshitij M Bhat

comment: One of the most humble senior I met in college, hope we could have talked a little more. Thank you for the time we spent!
name: Krish Agrawal

comment: Exploring books in library was really fun with you. Our walks around the campus, vibing to the same Taylor swift songs. Glad to have met and known you. You are gonna achieve everything in life Shruti. Stay the same. I will miss you.
name: Kanishka Goyal

comment: Hey Shruti! Your curious spirit and dynamism have made every moment memorable. You truly embody the saying 'Chota packet, bada dhamaka.' 😂 Wishing you all the best on your journey ahead!
name: Priyansh Jaseja

comment: Hey, your curiosity and determination to learn and expressions after missing a ball 😂 were amazing in GC. Got to know you very late. hope we had interacted more. all the best for the future.
name: Devansh Agrawal

comment: Never seen so curious a person as you yr, with all your little questions about everything, asked so genuinely.. And haan, had fun with all that bitching about few Desis girls😂
name: Khushi Verma

comment: Kudos to my first flatmates ever! I loved talking about random stuff (surprisingly, philosophy also came up XD) with you during breakfast in lockdown period. Fellow Swifties for life 🫶🏻✨ wishing you good luck and happiness for your future ❤️
name: Kirtika Zanzan

comment:
Fun loving person who is always up for any adventure and plan. Will miss those long walks and deep talks. Lots of plans to be executed in Bangalore. See you there 
and all the best for your future endeavors.
name: Chinmayi Adoni

comment: You know whom to contact to learn skateboarding 👍!! All the best!
name: Soham Ghewari

comment: You are my first friend in college. I would have never done those 5:30 am classes or the final WE project without you. It's always fun talking to you. Keep in touch.❤️❤️
name: Mitika Bhadada

comment: Though we had verry lil interaction, but u r really amazing person. And indeed, "Bhakti hi Shakti hai" 😂
name: Harshwardhan Chaube

comment: Will always be grateful to you for rescuing us at GC TT that day. You certainly know how to get to know people. All the best for the future!
name: Atharva Mohite

comment: Hi shruti..! I really had good time with you all these years we spent. Best of the time sharing project space and collaboration together.
name: Chetana Dharavathu

comment: In whatever little time I got to know you, u seemed very simple and easy to talk person...will miss those dinner talks a lot. Wishing you the best!!
name: Tanishq Selot

comment: Definitely had some nice and laid back conversations with you. I'm glad to have you as a friend and a well-wisher. Really loved how you always got annoyed when I would wander the campus at midnight purposelessly XD. Nice to have met someone so different and so similar. All the best Shruti <3
name: Vihaan Thora

comment: You're too sweet! It was truly my pleasure to be your mentee and get those tips. Wishing you nothing but the best as you continue to shine and grow in every aspect of life!
name: Sugandha Vani

comment: A good-hearted person with clear thoughts and great debating skills....... best wishes for the future ❤
name: Neha

comment: "How did we not meet for so long?" was what I thought the first time we got to know each other. It felt somewhat like meeting another version of me, a smarter & more awesome one. I'm glad we met & hope we meet again. All the Best for your future endeavours!
name: Sharvari Kulkarni

comment: Glad ki humari finally baat hui. Acha laga tumse baat krke. It was fun. All the best. Stay in touch.
name: Abhijit Joshi

comment: A kind and humble person. Easy to talk to and knowledge, wishing you best for future!
name: Sanjit Vyas

comment: Most adventurous girl in IITI and my first ever prom partner. Totally remember that night till date and all those deep discussions. You are older, mature and have really distinguished views on different things. Don't go on stamping ppl in autos and getting chased by dogs. Wishing you the best!!
name: Satwik Vankayalapati

comment: From the few conversations we had, you seem a fun person. Enjoy and All the best for your future.
name: Shaik Wanhar Aziz
